name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto open in the Spotify app

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sends all Spotify URLs to the dedicated Spotify app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically send all Spotify URLs to the dedicated Spotify app. Make sure you've installed the official app or it won't work!

No persistent background processes will run while this extension is active :)
